author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
Dak Adalat on

March 29

A Dak Adalat will be held at the office of the Senior Superintendent of Post Offices, Coimbatore Division, Good Shed Road, at 11 a.m. on March 29. Complaints and suggestions regarding postal service under Coimbatore Postal Division will be taken up at the Adalat.

Complaints could be sent to the above adress by post too.
title: Briefly (Three Items)
